author: pipermerriam
content:
Revised set of things that I believe should be discussed and/or agreed on in the call today.

- Move towards finalizing eth/69 https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9237  - PR discussion suggests that there is still work to do.
- Testing needs.  What do EL clients feel is necessary and beneficial in terms of testing.  Confirm May 1st deployment EL clients with dropped pre-merge history enabled.
- Confirm mainnet go-live timeline in conjunction with the Pectra fork.

author: potuz
content: Can anyone explain me why can' t some clients start dropping Sepolia right now? as long as geth doesn't drop those blocks will be there, there' s no need for coordination

author: potuz
content: and it will definitely help us know that CL clients are working towards this

author: pipermerriam
content:
I think it's about sync. It'll degrade the sync performance of the clients that haven't dropped yet. 

Probably not a hard blocker but worth considering.

author: pipermerriam
content: I would also like us to get an export of the pre merge sepolia history as era files.  Would any of the EL clients be able to do this?

author: acolytec3
content: will look and see if we can do this with our era package now

author: pipermerriam
content: Awesome. I wasn't aware that was already done

author: pipermerriam
content: A meta-EIP was suggested in the call today as the manner to formally communicate and document 4444s plans.  I'll plan on getting something submitted in this format soon unless I hear strong preferences for another format or manner of presenting this information.
